db:abstract.db:para: Creating a custom widget plugin for Qt Designer that uses signals and slots.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets uiplugin
QTDIR_build { # This is only for the Qt build. Do not use externally. We mean it. PLUGIN_TYPE = designer PLUGIN_CLASS_NAME = WorldTimeClockPlugin load(qt_plugin) CONFIG += install_ok } else { # Public example:
TARGET = $$qtLibraryTarget($$TARGET) CONFIG += plugin TEMPLATE = lib
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_PLUGINS]/designer INSTALLS += target
}
HEADERS = worldtimeclock.h \ worldtimeclockplugin.h SOURCES = worldtimeclock.cpp \ worldtimeclockplugin.cpp
